ENCS Network Administration Group

Hi, we're NAG, the Network Administration Group. For the most part, we take care of the firewalls, and the switches (mostly Cisco) in the faculty. We also share the some of the physical work (cabling) with the Technicians.

We also run a database of various information that helps us determine which pieces of equipment are where. We support the Desktop Group when they need to configure vlans for ghosting and we receive support from the Techs when it comes up keeping track of which switch ports are plugged into which patches, and which rooms the patches lead to.
